gurmukhi: kih kY idj Xau auiT jwq Bey ]
transliteration: Kah(i) Kai Dij Yau Outh(i) Jaat Bhae||
translation: Uttering these words, the Brahmins got up and went away;
But the spies gave the news (of the presence of his brothers there).10.300.

gurmukhi: qhwN isMG AjY min ros bFI ]
transliteration: Tahaan Singh Ajai Man(i) Ros Badhee||
translation: Then the anger increased in the mind of Ajai Singh.
In great rage, he ordered his forces of four types to move forward.

gurmukhi: q`h jwie prI j`h KqR brM ]
translation: The army reached there where both the superb Kshatriyas were stationed.

gurmukhi: bhu kUid pry idj swm GrM ]11]301]
transliteration: Bahu Kood(i) Dare Dij Saam Gharan||11||301||
translation: They jumped from the roof of the house into the abode of Sanaudhi Brahmin to take shelter.11.301.
The assembly of Brahmins met and reflected on the issue.

gurmukhi: sB hI idj mMfl god lIXo ]
translation: The whole assembly affectionately kept the two in their midst.

gurmukhi: kh kaun su bYiT ibcwru krYN ]
transliteration: Kah Kaoun Su Baith(i) Bichaar(u) Darain||
translation: They ruminated over the issue as to what measures be taken?

gurmukhi: niRp swQ rhYN nhI eyaU mrYN ]12]302]
translation: So that they may not offend the king and also save the two refugees.12.302.

gurmukhi: ieh BwNiq khI iqh qwih sbY ]
translation: When they said these words, then all of them desired:

gurmukhi: joaU mwn kihE soeI loq Bey ]
translation: Those who accepted it, they became without the thread.

gurmukhi: qyaU bYs huie bwxj krq Bey ]13]303]
transliteration: Teoo Bais Hue Baanaj Karat Bhae||13||303||
translation: They became Vaishyas and took trade as their occupation.13.303.
